ARABIC: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I do not require any provision from them and I do not require them to nourish Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I want no sustenance from them nor do I want them to feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I desire from them no provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I do not expect to receive any sustenance from them or that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: I do not ask any sustenance from them, nor wish that they give Me food.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: I seek not any provision from them nor do I ask that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I do not desire from them any sustenance and I do not desire that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I desire of them no provision, neither do I desire that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: I seek no livelihood from them, nor do I ask that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I seek no sustenance from them, nor do I want them to feed Me --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: I seek not any provision from them, nor I desire that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I desire no provision from them, nor do I desire that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: No Sustenance do I require of them, nor do I require that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: I seek not any provision from them (i.e. provision for themselves or for My creatures) nor do I ask that they should feed Me (i.e. feed themselves or My creatures).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I do not desire provision from them, nor do I desire that they should feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I need no livelihood from them, nor do I need them to feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:57] I do not desire from them any provision, [either] for Myself, for themselves, or for others, nor do I desire that they should feed Me, or [feed] themselves or others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (I seek no livelihood from them) I have not made them responsible to provide sustenance for themselves, (nor do I ask that they should feed Me) nor do I ask them to help Me to provide their provisions.
